Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
Sabotage: Weapon (This ally can attack opposing weapons.)
When Nealos sabotages a weapon, exhaust it. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Retainer Salvan
effect:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
Sabotage: Armor (This ally can attack opposing armor.)
When Salvan sabotages a player's armor, exhaust all of that player's armor.

name: Retainer Zaelan
effect:
Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.)
Sabotage: Equipment (This ally can attack opposing equipment.)
When Zaelan sabotages an equipment, put it into its owner's hand.

name: Retaliation
effect: Talent: Arms

name: Retribution of the Light
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: All players shuffle their graveyards into their decks.
"Return to Shadow Hold, kill Trey's torturer, and find his remains. There is no reason we can't tie off all these loose ends while Arko'narin mourns in her own private way." - Jessir Moonbow

name: Ring of Flowing Light
effect: [Activate], Exhaust X of your equipment ==> Your hero heals X damage from itself.

name: Ripper
effect: 3 ==> Double Ripper's ATK this turn.
To the beasts of Outland, Azeroth is a whole new world of prey.

name: Robotic Homing Chicken
effect:
Elusive.
At the start of your turn, each player rolls a die. If two or more players roll the same number, destroy Robotic Homing Chicken and all allies in those players' parties.
Decades of gnomish engineering have produced the ultimate design in fowl weaponry.

name: Roque Training
effect: Talent: Subtlety

name: Routeen
effect: [Activate] ==> Routeen deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally that was dealt damage this turn.

name: Ruala the Spotter
effect: Exhaust your hero ==> Target ally has +3 ATK this turn.
"Never been good at fightin', mon. Spottin', that's my trade."

name: Rulrin
effect:
Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
Untargetable

name: Runesong Dagger
effect:
When you draw a card, put a verse counter on Runesong Dagger.
1, Remove three verse counters ==> Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target ally.
Its lyrics are a chorus of death.

name: Sacred Purification
effect: Talent: Holy

name: Safeguard
effect: Talent: Protection

name: Salt the Wounds
effect: Talent: Fury
"All shall feel my wrath." - Halavar

name: Sanctity Aura
effect: Talent: Retribution
From the youngest child to the most veteran soldier, the Light heartens all who are worthy.

name: Scepter of the Unholy
effect: If a card or effect you control would cause an opponent to discard a card, he discards a random card instead.

name: Scraps
effect: At the start of your turn, destroy Scraps unless you remove an ally card in any graveyard from the game.
"Why is it looking at me like that?"

name: Seamus Somerset
effect:
Ferocity
When Seamus attacks, you may remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
"Can it wait? I'm busy here."

name: Sentry Totem
effect: Talent: Enhancement
Aided by the Spirit of Air, a shaman may be able to see faraway objects or events, whether the distance be physical or temporal.

name: Serpent Sting
effect: Talent: Marksmanship
Laced with poisonous toxins, the serpent sting burns the very blood of its target.

name: Shadala
effect: When you play an ability, you may destroy target ability

name: Shadow Weaving
effect: Talent: Shadow

name: Shadowstalker's Sash
effect: Friendly Druids and Rogues have stealth. (Can't protect against them.)

name: Shaman Training
effect: Talent: Enhancement

name: Sharial
effect:
Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
[Activate] ==> Exhaust target equipment.

name: Shattrath City Peacekeeper
effect:
Protector
Allies not named Shattrath City Peacekeeper have -1 ATK.

name: Sheath of Light
effect: Talent: Protection

name: Shem Reznict
effect: [Activate] ==> Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Shem deals 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.

name: Shred
effect: Talent: Feral
"Of course claws are better than a weapon: they have three times the blades!" - Arktos

name: Silea Dawnwalker
effect: When you play an ability, you may destroy target equipment.
All blood elves are tied to the arcane, even those who don't practice the arts themselves.

name: Singing Crystal Axe
effect:
Singing Crystal Axe enters play with four slow counters.
You pay 1 more to strike with Singing Crystal Axe for each slow counter.
When you strike with Singing Crystal Axe, remove a slow counter.

name: Siphon Life
effect: Talent: Affliction

name: Sironas
effect: At the start of your turn, the player with the most resources destroys one of them. If two or more players are tied, you choose which one destroys a resource.
"The draenei's fatal flaw is their trusting nature."

name: Skyfire Hawk-Bow
effect: When you strike with Skyfire Hawk-Bow, your hero has long-range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)

name: Soul Inversion
effect: Talent: Affliction
"There's always a cost for power - you just have to decide whether or not you can afford it." - Forang Deathrattle

name: Sprint
effect: Talent: Combat
Sometimes you just have to get away from it all.

name: Stoneclaw Totem
effect: Talent: Elemental

name: Stormshield of Renewal
effect: When your hero heals damage from a friendly ally, it also heals that much from itself.

name: Strangling Roots
effect: Talent: Balance
The roots not only grip like steel, but they cut like it as well.

name: Survey the Land
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: If you control an ability, ally, or equipment, draw a card, or two cards if you control all three.
"Even the smallest detail that you may think inconsequential could be useful for our purposes." - Altruis the Sufferer

name: Sustain or Reclaim
effect: Talent: Restoration
Druids understand the interdependence of all living things. When this delicate equilibrium is disrupted, the druid works to restore the balance.

name: Swallow Soul
effect: Talent: Destruction
"Shaza-kie!!"

name: Swipe
effect: Talent: Feral
"Maybe forming into a line wasn't such a good idea."

name: Syluri
effect:
Protector
[Activate], Destroy Syluri ==> Destroy target equipment.

name: Taheo Skyspeaker
effect: Talent: Balance

name: Tarwila Gladespring
effect:
Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
[Activate] ==> You pay 1 less to play your next card this turn.

name: Terokk's Quill
effect: Terokk's Quill has +4 ATK while your hero is defending.

name: The Blood is Life
effect:
During your turn, destroy an ally in your party and pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's health.

name: The Bringer of Death
effect: 3, [Activate], Destroy The Bringer of Death ==> Destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment. Use only on your turn.

name: The Darkeater
effect:
Other Shadow allies have +2 ATK / +2 health.
Non-Shadow allies have -2 ATK / -2 health.
"Those who stand against the shadow will ultimately be consumed by it."

name: The Essence Focuser
effect: If a hero or ally in your party would heal damage, it heals that much +1 instead.

name: The Formation of Felbane
effect:
Pay 7 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability, ally, equipment, and quest card into your hand
and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Light's Largess
effect: Talent: Holy
"The Light is mine to command when I need it." - Hekto Starspire

name: The Name of the Beast
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Choose "ability," "ally," "equipment," or "quest." Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed card of that kind into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"You return! Astounding. Did you discover the true name?" - Loramus Thalipedes

name: The Root of All Evil
effect:
During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Turn target quest face down.
"Only the essence of the fallen demon will begin the lengthy healing process of the Winterfall tribeâ€¦and the salvation of Timbermaw Hold." - Gorn One Eye

name: The Spirit Polluted
effect:
Put 3 damage on your hero and pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
"Watoosun was able to shed the stink of corruption, but in doing so, created a twisted spirit essence." - Elementalist Lo'ap

name: Thick as Thieves
effect: Talent: Subtlety

name: Thrill of the Hunt
effect: Talent: Survival

name: Thulthun
effect: Opposing allies lose and can't have elusive or stealth.

name: Thundering Footsteps
effect: As an additional cost to play Thundering Footsteps, stomp your feet. Put a Mechanical ally token named Fel Reaver with 10 ATK / 10 health into play.

effect: At the start of each player's turn, he exhausts one of his resources.

"I'm always on the winning side."

name: Vengeance of the Illidari
effect: When you play an ability, ready your hero.

name: Vindicator Belian
effect:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)

effect:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)

Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)

effect:
Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.)
Protector

The Aldor and their naaru patrons actively work to be a beacon of hope in a broken world.

name: Vindicator Zalreth
effect:
Aldor Reputation, Protector
When Zalreth is destroyed, you may remove him from the game. If you do, put an ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

name: Volin Netherburn
effect: When you play an ability, Volin deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally and 2 shadow damage to himself.

name: Voren'thal the Seer
effect:
Scryer Reputation (can't put Aldor cards in your deck)

effect: Exhaust your hero ==> Exhaust target ally.

effect: Damage that would be dealt with Wand of Eternal Light is unpreventable.
